name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and grated Parmesan cheese.
Cook bacon in a pan until crispy, then add minced garlic.
Drain spaghetti and add it to the pan with bacon and garlic.
Remove from heat, add the egg and cheese mixture, and toss quickly to coat the spaghetti.
Season with black pepper and salt to taste.
Serve immediately.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan and cook the marinated chicken until browned.
Remove chicken and sauté chopped onions in the same pan.
Add tomato puree, spices, and cook until the mixture thickens.
Add the chicken back to the pan and simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in cream and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
In a bowl, cream together butter, sugar, and brown sugar.
Beat in eggs and vanilla extract.
Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls of dough onto a baking sheet.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown.
Let cool before serving.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala paste for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pan, cook onion, garlic, and ginger until soft.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in canned tomatoes and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add cream and garam masala, cook for another 5 minutes.
Season with salt and serve with rice or naan.

name: Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
steps: Melt butter in a pan and cook onion until soft.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Add mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes.
Sprinkle flour and stir, then add beef broth.
Simmer until sauce thickens.
Stir in sour cream and mustard, season with salt and pepper.
Serve with egg noodles or rice.

name: Pad Thai
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened.
Mix fish sauce, tamarind paste, and brown sugar in a bowl.
Heat oil in a wok, cook garlic until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Push shrimp to the side, scramble eggs in the wok.
Add noodles and sauce mixture, stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Add bean sprouts and green onions, toss well.
Top with crushed peanuts and serve with lime wedges.

name: Shakshuka
steps: Heat olive oil in a skillet and cook onion and bell pepper until soft.
Add garlic, paprika, and cumin, cook for 1 minute.
Stir in canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Make small wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them.
Cover and cook until eggs are set.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley, and serve with bread.

name: Sushi Rolls
steps: Cook sushi rice with water according to package instructions.
Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt, then fold into rice.
Place nori sheet on a bamboo mat.
Spread rice evenly on nori, leaving 2cm at the top.
Add salmon, cucumber, and avocado in the center.
Roll tightly using the mat.
Slice into pieces and serve with soy sauce.

name: Greek Salad
steps: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, onion, and bell pepper in a bowl.
Add feta cheese and olives.
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently.
Serve fresh.

name: Fish Tacos
steps: Season fish with olive oil, paprika, cumin, salt, and pepper.
Cook fish in a pan until flaky.
Warm tortillas in a skillet.
Mix sour cream and lime juice for sauce.
Assemble tacos with fish, cabbage, sauce, and cilantro.
Serve immediately.

name: Falafel Wrap
steps: Blend chickpeas, onion, garlic, parsley, flour, cumin, coriander, and baking powder into a coarse paste.
Shape mixture into small balls.
Fry falafel in oil until golden brown.
Warm pita breads and fill with falafel.
Drizzle with tahini sauce and serve.

name: Ratatouille
steps: Heat olive oil in a pan, cook onion and garlic until fragrant.
Add eggplant, zucchini, and peppers, cook until softened.
Stir in canned tomatoes and thyme.
Simmer for 30 minutes until vegetables are tender.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve warm.

name: Clam Chowder
steps: Melt butter in a pot, cook onion and celery until soft.
Add flour and stir for 1 minute.
Gradually whisk in milk and broth.
Add potatoes and cook until tender.
Add clams and cook for 5 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley.
Serve hot.

name: Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 30 minutes.
Melt butter in a pan and cook onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in canned tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
Add cream and garam masala, simmer for 5 minutes.
Season with salt and serve with rice or naan.

name: Paella
steps: Heat olive oil in a paella pan and cook chicken until browned.
Add onion, garlic, and bell pepper, cook until soft.
Stir in rice and saffron, mix well.
Add broth and simmer for 20 minutes without stirring.
Place shrimp and mussels on top, cook until seafood is done.
Season with salt and serve hot.

name: Pho
steps: Roast onion and ginger until slightly charred.
Simmer beef bones with roasted onion, ginger, and spices in water for 1.5 hours.
Strain broth and season with fish sauce.
Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Place noodles in bowls, top with sliced beef.
Pour hot broth over beef to cook it.
Serve with herbs, bean sprouts, and lime.

name: Moussaka
steps: Brush eggplant slices with olive oil and roast until tender.
Cook lamb with onion and garlic until browned.
Add canned tomatoes, cinnamon, salt, and pepper, simmer 20 minutes.
Layer eggplant and meat mixture in a baking dish.
Top with béchamel sauce and Parmesan.
Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes until golden.
Serve hot.

name: Fajitas
steps: Season chicken with cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper.
Heat oil in a skillet and cook chicken until done.
Add peppers and onion, cook until tender.
Warm tortillas in a skillet.
Fill tortillas with chicken and vegetables.
Serve with sour cream.

name: Coq au Vin
steps: Cook bacon in a large pot until crisp, remove and set aside.
Brown chicken in bacon fat, then remove.
Cook onion, garlic, and carrots in the pot.
Return chicken and bacon, sprinkle with flour, and stir.
Pour in wine and broth, simmer for 1 hour.
Add mushrooms and cook another 20 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, serve hot.

name: Bibimbap
steps: Sauté zucchini, carrot, spinach, and bean sprouts separately in sesame oil.
Cook beef with soy sauce until browned.
Fry eggs sunny side up.
Place rice in bowls and arrange vegetables and beef on top.
Top with an egg and gochujang.
Sprinkle sesame seeds and serve.

name: Gnocchi with Pesto
steps: Cook gnocchi according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan and add cooked gnocchi.
Stir in basil pesto and toss well.
Season with salt and pepper.
Top with Parmesan and garnish with basil.
Serve warm.

name: Chicken Shawarma
steps: Marinate chicken with yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, and spices for 30 minutes.
Cook chicken in a skillet until browned and cooked through.
Warm pita breads.
Fill with chicken and drizzle with tahini sauce.
Serve hot.

name: Beef Bulgogi
steps: Marinate beef in soy sauce, sugar, sesame oil, garlic, and ginger for 30 minutes.
Heat a skillet and cook beef until caramelized.
Top with green onions and sesame seeds.
Serve with steamed rice.

name: Chili Con Carne
steps: Heat olive oil in a pot, cook onion and garlic until soft.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in bell pepper, chili powder, and cumin.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 30 minutes.
Add kidney beans and cook for another 10 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, serve hot.

name: Lasagna
steps: Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions.
Cook beef with onion and garlic until browned.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 20 minutes.
Layer noodles, meat sauce, ricotta, and béchamel in a baking dish.
Top with mozzarella cheese.
Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Ramen
steps: Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions.
Heat chicken broth, soy sauce, and miso paste in a pot.
Cook pork belly slices until browned.
Divide noodles into bowls, pour broth over them.
Top with pork, boiled eggs, nori, corn, and green onions.
Serve hot.

name: Tandoori Chicken
steps: Mix yogurt, lemon juice, spices, ginger, and garlic to make marinade.
Coat chicken with marinade and refrigerate for 30 minutes.
Preheat oven to 200°C.
Bake chicken for 35–40 minutes until cooked through.
Brush with oil halfway through cooking.
Serve hot with rice or naan.

name: Ceviche
steps: Marinate fish in lime juice for 15 minutes until opaque.
Drain excess juice and mix with onion, chili, and cilantro.
Season with salt.
Serve chilled.

name: Stuffed Peppers
steps: Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
Cook beef with onion and garlic until browned.
Mix with rice and half of canned tomatoes.
Stuff peppers with mixture and place in a baking dish.
Top with remaining tomatoes and mozzarella.
Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken Alfredo
steps: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
Cook chicken in butter until golden brown.
Add garlic and cream, simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until sauce thickens.
Toss with pasta and season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

name: Shepherd's Pie
steps: Cook lamb with onion and carrots until browned.
Stir in tomato paste and flour, cook for 2 minutes.
Add beef broth and simmer until thickened.
Spread meat mixture in a baking dish.
Top with mashed potatoes and butter.
Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes until golden.
Serve hot.

name: Caprese Salad
steps: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a plate.
Tuck basil leaves between slices.
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve fresh.

name: Shoyu Chicken
steps: Mix soy sauce, brown sugar, vinegar, garlic, and ginger to make marinade.
Add chicken and marinate for 30 minutes.
Simmer chicken in marinade for 40 minutes until tender.
Garnish with green onions and sesame seeds.
Serve with rice.

name: Beef Wellington
steps: Season beef with salt and pepper, sear on all sides, then brush with Dijon mustard.
Cook mushrooms in butter until dry.
Wrap beef with prosciutto and mushroom mixture.
Wrap with puff pastry and brush with egg wash.
Bake at 200°C for 40 minutes until golden brown.
Rest for 10 minutes before slicing.

name: Gazpacho
steps: Combine tomatoes, cucumber, pepper, onion, and garlic in a blender.
Add olive oil, vinegar, and water, then blend until smooth.
Season with salt and pepper.
Chill for at least 1 hour.
Serve cold.

name: Chicken Parmesan
steps: Coat chicken in egg, then breadcrumbs mixed with Parmesan.
Fry chicken in olive oil until golden brown.
Place chicken in a baking dish, top with tomatoes and mozzarella.
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes until cheese melts.
Serve with pasta or salad.

name: Goulash
steps: Heat oil in a pot, cook onions until golden.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Stir in paprika and garlic.
Add carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, and broth.
Simmer for 1 hour until beef is tender.
Season with salt and pepper, serve hot.

name: Peking Duck
steps: Mix honey, soy sauce, and vinegar, then brush over duck.
Roast duck at 200°C for 90 minutes until crispy.
Slice duck into thin pieces.
Serve with pancakes, cucumber, green onions, and hoisin sauce.

name: Tagine
steps: Heat olive oil in a pot, cook onion and garlic until fragrant.
Add lamb and brown on all sides.
Stir in cinnamon, cumin, and tomatoes.
Add carrots, zucchini, and broth.
Simmer for 1 hour until lamb is tender.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with couscous.

name: Tempura
steps: Mix flour, egg, and ice-cold water to make a light batter.
Heat oil in a deep pan.
Dip shrimp and vegetables in batter.
Fry until golden and crispy.
Drain on paper towels and serve with soy sauce.

name: Osso Buco
steps: Dredge veal shanks in flour and brown in olive oil.
Add onion, carrots, and garlic, cook until softened.
Stir in tomatoes, broth, and thyme.
Cover and simmer for 1.5 hours until meat is tender.
Serve with risotto or polenta.

name: Chicken Satay
steps: Marinate chicken in soy sauce, peanut butter, curry powder, lime juice, and garlic for 20 minutes.
Thread chicken onto skewers.
Grill or pan-fry skewers until cooked through.
Serve with peanut sauce.

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook ground beef with onion until browned.
Stir in cumin, chili powder, and salt.
Warm taco shells in a skillet.
Fill with beef, lettuce, cheese, and tomato.
Top with sour cream and serve.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a pan, cook onion and garlic until fragrant.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in canned tomatoes, tomato paste, and oregano.
Simmer for 30 minutes until sauce thickens.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve over spaghetti with Parmesan.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
steps: Dip eggplant slices in egg, then coat with breadcrumbs and Parmesan.
Fry in olive oil until golden brown.
Layer eggplant, tomatoes, and mozzarella in a baking dish.
Repeat layers and finish with mozzarella.
Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes until bubbly.
Serve hot.

name: Croque Monsieur
steps: Make a béchamel sauce by cooking butter, flour, and milk until thickened.
Stir in Dijon mustard, salt, and pepper.
Assemble sandwiches with bread, ham, and cheese.
Spread béchamel sauce on top.
Bake at 200°C for 10 minutes until golden.
Serve hot.

name: Lentil Soup
steps: Heat olive oil in a pot, cook onion, garlic, and carrots until soft.
Add lentils, cumin, and turmeric, stir well.
Pour in vegetable broth and bring to a boil.
Simmer for 30 minutes until lentils are tender.
Blend soup if desired for a creamy texture.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with lemon wedges.

name: Pasta Primavera
steps: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a skillet, cook garlic until fragrant.
Add zucchini, carrot, and bell pepper, cook until tender.
Stir in cherry tomatoes and cook for 2 minutes.
Toss pasta with vegetables and Parmesan.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve hot.

name: Miso Soup
steps: Heat dashi stock in a pot until warm.
Dissolve miso paste in a small amount of warm broth, then add to pot.
Add tofu and nori, simmer for 5 minutes.
Top with green onions and serve hot.

name: Shredded Beef Enchiladas
steps: Cook beef with onion, garlic, tomatoes, and spices until tender, about 1 hour.
Shred beef and mix with sauce.
Fill tortillas with beef mixture, roll up, and place in a baking dish.
Top with cheese and bake at 180°C for 20 minutes.
Serve hot.

name: Chicken Fried Rice
steps: Cook chicken in sesame oil until browned.
Push chicken to one side, scramble eggs on the other side of the pan.
Add rice and mixed vegetables, stir-fry for 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce and mix well.
Top with green onions and serve.

name: Beef Rendang
steps: Heat oil in a pot, cook onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add beef and brown on all sides.
Stir in curry paste and coconut milk.
Add lime leaves and simmer for 1.5 hours until beef is tender.
Season with salt and serve with rice.

name: Chow Mein
steps: Cook noodles according to package instructions.
Heat sesame oil in a wok, cook garlic until fragrant.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Add noodles, soy sauce, and oyster sauce, toss well.
Serve hot.

name: Beef Pho
steps: Roast onion and ginger until charred.
Simmer beef bones, onion, ginger, and spices in water for 1.5 hours.
Strain broth and season with fish sauce.
Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Place noodles and beef slices in bowls.
Pour hot broth over beef to cook it.
Serve with herbs, sprouts, and lime.

name: Calamari Fritti
steps: Mix flour, paprika, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Dredge squid rings in flour mixture.
Heat oil in a deep pan and fry squid until golden.
Drain on paper towels.
Serve with lemon wedges.

name: Shabu Shabu
ingredients: Soy sauce and ponzu for dipping
steps: Heat dashi broth in a pot.
Add vegetables and tofu, cook until tender.
Dip beef slices into hot broth briefly to cook.
Serve with dipping sauces.

name: Chicken Marsala
steps: Coat chicken in flour and season with salt and pepper.
Cook chicken in butter until golden brown, then remove.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Pour in Marsala wine and broth, simmer until reduced.
Return chicken to pan and simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

name: Shakshuka with Feta
steps: Heat olive oil in a skillet, cook onion and pepper until soft.
Add garlic, paprika, and cumin, stir for 1 minute.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Make wells in sauce, crack eggs into them.
Cover and cook until eggs set.
Top with feta and serve.

name: Beef Stroganoff with Mushrooms
steps: Cook onion in butter until soft.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Add mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in beef broth and simmer until thickened.
Stir in sour cream and mustard.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Chicken Adobo
steps: Marinate chicken in soy sauce, vinegar, and garlic for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pot, sauté onion until soft.
Add chicken and marinade, bring to a boil.
Add bay leaves and peppercorns.
Simmer for 40 minutes until chicken is tender.
Serve with rice.

name: Vegetable Korma
steps: Heat oil in a pot, cook onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add curry paste and stir for 1 minute.
Add carrot, potato, and cauliflower.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 25 minutes.
Season with salt and serve with rice or naan.

name: Bangers and Mash
steps: Cook sausages in a skillet until browned.
Boil potatoes until tender, then mash with butter and milk.
Cook onions in oil until caramelized, then add flour.
Stir in beef broth and simmer until gravy thickens.
Serve sausages with mashed potatoes and onion gravy.

name: Chicken Pad Krapow
steps: Heat oil in a wok, cook garlic and chilies until fragrant.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in soy sauce, fish sauce, oyster sauce, and sugar.
Add basil leaves and stir until wilted.
Serve with steamed rice.

name: Beef Pho
steps: Roast onion and ginger until charred.
Simmer beef bones, onion, ginger, and spices in water for 1.5 hours.
Strain broth and season with fish sauce.
Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Place noodles and beef slices in bowls.
Pour hot broth over beef to cook it.
Serve with herbs, sprouts, and lime.

name: Calamari Fritti
steps: Mix flour, paprika, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Dredge squid rings in flour mixture.
Heat oil in a deep pan and fry squid until golden.
Drain on paper towels.
Serve with lemon wedges.

name: Shabu Shabu
ingredients: Soy sauce and ponzu for dipping
steps: Heat dashi broth in a pot.
Add vegetables and tofu, cook until tender.
Dip beef slices into hot broth briefly to cook.
Serve with dipping sauces.

name: Chicken Marsala
steps: Coat chicken in flour and season with salt and pepper.
Cook chicken in butter until golden brown, then remove.
Add mushrooms and cook until tender.
Pour in Marsala wine and broth, simmer until reduced.
Return chicken to pan and simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

name: Shakshuka with Feta
steps: Heat olive oil in a skillet, cook onion and pepper until soft.
Add garlic, paprika, and cumin, stir for 1 minute.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Make wells in sauce, crack eggs into them.
Cover and cook until eggs set.
Top with feta and serve.

name: Beef Stroganoff with Mushrooms
steps: Cook onion in butter until soft.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Add mushrooms and cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in beef broth and simmer until thickened.
Stir in sour cream and mustard.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Chicken Adobo
steps: Marinate chicken in soy sauce, vinegar, and garlic for 30 minutes.
Heat oil in a pot, sauté onion until soft.
Add chicken and marinade, bring to a boil.
Add bay leaves and peppercorns.
Simmer for 40 minutes until chicken is tender.
Serve with rice.

name: Vegetable Korma
steps: Heat oil in a pot, cook onion, garlic, and ginger until fragrant.
Add curry paste and stir for 1 minute.
Add carrot, potato, and cauliflower.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer for 25 minutes.
Season with salt and serve with rice or naan.

name: Bangers and Mash
steps: Cook sausages in a skillet until browned.
Boil potatoes until tender, then mash with butter and milk.
Cook onions in oil until caramelized, then add flour.
Stir in beef broth and simmer until gravy thickens.
Serve sausages with mashed potatoes and onion gravy.

name: Chicken Pad Krapow
steps: Heat oil in a wok, cook garlic and chilies until fragrant.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in soy sauce, fish sauce, oyster sauce, and sugar.
Add basil leaves and stir until wilted.
Serve with steamed rice.

name: Lamb Tagine
steps: Heat olive oil in a pot, cook onion and garlic until soft.
Add lamb and brown on all sides.
Stir in spices and canned tomatoes.
Add dried apricots and simmer for 1 hour.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve with couscous.

name: Seafood Paella
steps: Heat olive oil in a paella pan, cook onion, garlic, and bell pepper until soft.
Add rice and paprika, stir for 2 minutes.
Pour in broth and simmer for 15 minutes.
Add seafood and cook until rice is tender and seafood is cooked.
Serve hot with lemon wedges.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
steps: Cut tops off peppers and remove seeds.
Cook onion and garlic in olive oil until soft.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in rice, oregano, and half the tomatoes.
Stuff peppers with mixture and place in baking dish.
Top with remaining tomatoes.
Bake at 180°C for 30 minutes.

name: Sushi Rolls
steps: Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar.
Place nori on a bamboo mat and spread rice evenly.
Add salmon, cucumber, and avocado in the center.
Roll tightly and slice into pieces.
Serve with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger.

name: Moussaka
steps: Fry eggplant slices until golden and set aside.
Cook onion and garlic in olive oil, add ground beef and brown.
Add tomatoes and cinnamon, simmer for 20 minutes.
Make béchamel sauce with butter, flour, and milk.
Layer eggplant, meat sauce, and béchamel in a baking dish.
Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes until golden.

name: Beef Tacos
steps: Cook onion and garlic in a skillet until soft.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Stir in cumin and chili powder.
Fill taco shells with beef mixture.
Top with lettuce, tomato, and cheese.
Serve with sour cream.

name: Pad Thai
steps: Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Heat oil in a wok, cook shrimp until pink.
Push shrimp aside, scramble eggs in the pan.
Add noodles, fish sauce, soy sauce, and tamarind paste.
Stir in bean sprouts and green onions.
Top with peanuts before serving.

name: Shepherd’s Pie
steps: Cook onion and carrots in olive oil until soft.
Add ground lamb and cook until browned.
Stir in tomato paste and peas, simmer for 10 minutes.
Boil potatoes until tender, then mash with butter and milk.
Spread lamb mixture in a baking dish, top with mashed potatoes.
Bake at 200°C for 25 minutes until golden.

name: Falafel Wrap
ingredients: Tahini sauce and salad for serving
steps: Blend chickpeas, garlic, onion, spices, flour, and parsley into a paste.
Form into small balls and fry until golden brown.
Place falafel in pita bread with salad.
Drizzle with tahini sauce and serve.

name: Chicken Alfredo
steps: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
Cook chicken in olive oil until browned, then remove.
Melt butter in a pan, add garlic and cream, simmer for 5 minutes.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until sauce thickens.
Add chicken and pasta, toss to coat.
Serve hot.

name: Clam Chowder
steps: Cook onion and celery in butter until soft.
Add flour and stir to form a roux.
Slowly add milk and cream, stirring until thickened.
Add potatoes and cook until tender.
Add clams and simmer for 5 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper and serve hot.

name: Korean Bibimbap
steps: Cook beef with soy sauce and sesame oil until browned.
Stir-fry carrot and zucchini separately until tender.
Arrange rice in bowls and top with beef, vegetables, and spinach.
Fry an egg and place on top.
Add gochujang and sesame seeds before serving.

name: Chicken Parmesan
steps: Dip chicken in egg, then coat with breadcrumbs and Parmesan.
Fry in olive oil until golden brown.
Place in baking dish, top with tomato sauce and mozzarella.
Bake at 180°C for 20 minutes until cheese melts.
Serve hot with pasta or salad.

name: Shrimp Scampi
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat butter and olive oil in a skillet, cook garlic until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Pour in white wine and lemon juice, simmer for 2 minutes.
Toss pasta with shrimp mixture.
Garnish with parsley and serve.

name: French Onion Soup
steps: Cook onions in butter and oil until caramelized, about 40 minutes.
Sprinkle sugar to enhance caramelization.
Add beef broth and simmer for 20 minutes.
Toast baguette slices.
Serve soup with bread topped with Gruyère, melted under broiler.

name: Beef Burritos
ingredients: Salsa and sour cream for serving
steps: Cook onion and garlic in oil until soft.
Add beef and cook until browned.
Stir in rice and beans.
Fill tortillas with beef mixture and cheese.
Roll up and toast in a skillet until golden.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

name: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Cook onion, garlic, and ginger in butter until soft.
Add canned tomatoes, chili powder, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Blend sauce until smooth, return to pan.
Add paneer cubes, cream, and garam masala.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with naan or rice.

name: Chicken Satay
steps: Marinate chicken in soy sauce, curry powder, and oil for 20 minutes.
Thread chicken onto skewers and grill until cooked.
Make peanut sauce with coconut milk, peanut butter, lime juice, and soy sauce.
Serve skewers with peanut sauce.

name: Ratatouille
steps: Heat olive oil in a pot, cook onion and garlic until soft.
Add eggplant, zucchini, and bell pepper, cook until tender.
Stir in canned tomatoes and thyme.
Simmer for 30 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Jambalaya
steps: Cook onion, bell pepper, and celery in olive oil until soft.
Add chicken and sausage, cook until browned.
Stir in paprika, rice, and broth.
Simmer for 20 minutes until rice is nearly done.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Serve hot.

name: Goulash
steps: Heat oil in a pot, cook onions and garlic until soft.
Add beef and brown on all sides.
Stir in paprika, peppers, and tomatoes.
Pour in beef broth and simmer for 1 hour.
Add potatoes and cook until tender.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

name: Stuffed Cabbage Rolls
steps: Blanch cabbage leaves until softened.
Mix pork, rice, onion, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Place mixture in cabbage leaves and roll tightly.
Arrange rolls in a baking dish.
Mix canned tomatoes and tomato paste, pour over rolls.
Bake at 180°C for 50 minutes.

name: Fish and Chips
steps: Mix flour, beer, and baking powder into a batter.
Coat fish fillets in batter.
Fry potatoes until golden, set aside.
Fry fish until crispy and golden.
Season with salt and serve with fries and lemon.

name: Baklava
steps: Layer phyllo sheets with melted butter in a baking dish.
Sprinkle chopped nuts and cinnamon between layers.
Repeat until all ingredients are used.
Cut into diamond shapes.
Bake at 180°C for 40 minutes.
Simmer sugar, water, and honey into a syrup.
Pour syrup over baked baklava and cool before serving.

name: Okonomiyaki
steps: Mix flour, eggs, and dashi into a batter.
Fold in shredded cabbage.
Heat oil in a skillet, pour batter, and top with pork slices.
Cook until golden on both sides.
Top with okonomiyaki sauce, mayonnaise, and bonito flakes.

name: Beef Wellington
steps: Season and sear beef tenderloin, set aside.
Cook mushrooms and onion in butter until dry.
Wrap beef with prosciutto and mushroom mixture.
Encase in puff pastry and brush with egg.
Bake at 200°C for 40 minutes until golden.
Rest before slicing and serving.

name: Huevos Rancheros
steps: Heat tortillas in a skillet until warm.
Spread refried beans on each tortilla.
Fry eggs sunny-side up and place on top.
Spoon salsa over eggs.
Garnish with avocado and serve.

name: Pierogi
steps: Mix flour, egg, and water into a dough, rest for 30 minutes.
Mix potatoes, cheese, salt, and pepper for filling.
Roll dough, cut circles, fill with potato mixture, and seal.
Boil pierogi until they float.
Fry onions in butter and serve over pierogi.

name: Pho Ga (Chicken Pho)
steps: Simmer chicken with onion, ginger, and spices in water for 1 hour.
Remove chicken, shred meat, and strain broth.
Cook rice noodles according to package instructions.
Assemble bowls with noodles, chicken, and broth.
Serve with herbs, sprouts, and lime.

name: Tagliatelle al Tartufo
steps: Cook tagliatelle according to package instructions.
Heat butter and olive oil in a skillet, add garlic.
Toss pasta with sauce and Parmesan.
Top with shaved truffle.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Lobster Bisque
steps: Cook onion, carrot, and garlic in butter until soft.
Stir in flour and tomato paste, cook 1 minute.
Add seafood stock and simmer for 20 minutes.
Blend until smooth.
Stir in cream and lobster meat, heat through.
Season with salt and pepper and serve.

name: Ramen
steps: Simmer chicken broth with garlic and ginger for 20 minutes.
Cook pork belly until browned.
Cook ramen noodles according to package instructions.
Assemble bowls with noodles, pork, soft-boiled eggs, and broth.
Drizzle with soy sauce and sesame oil, garnish with green onions and nori.

name: Ceviche
steps: Place fish in a bowl and pour lime juice over it.
Add onion, chili, and cilantro.
Mix gently and let marinate for 15 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper and serve chilled.

name: Coq au Vin
steps: Cook bacon in olive oil until crisp, remove.
Brown chicken pieces in same pan.
Cook onion, garlic, and mushrooms until soft.
Sprinkle flour, stir, then add wine and simmer for 1 hour.
Return bacon, season with salt and pepper, and serve.

name: Tom Yum Soup
steps: Simmer stock with lemongrass, lime leaves, garlic, and chili for 10 minutes.
Add mushrooms and shrimp, cook until shrimp turns pink.
Season with fish sauce and lime juice.
Garnish with cilantro and serve hot.

name: Ratatouille Tian
steps: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Sauté garlic in olive oil until fragrant.
Layer vegetables in a baking dish, sprinkle with thyme, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 40 minutes until tender.
Serve warm.

name: Pasta Puttanesca
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Heat olive oil in a skillet, cook garlic and anchovies until fragrant.
Add tomatoes, olives, capers, and chili flakes.
Simmer for 10 minutes.
Toss pasta with sauce and serve.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and garam masala for 20 minutes.
Cook onion, garlic, and ginger in oil until soft.
Add tomato paste and simmer 5 minutes.
Add chicken and cook until done.
Stir in cream and simmer 5 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

name: Peking Duck
steps: Mix honey, soy sauce, and vinegar, then brush over duck.
Roast duck at 200°C for 90 minutes until crispy.
Slice duck into thin pieces.
Serve with pancakes, cucumber, green onions, and hoisin sauce.

name: Cannelloni with Spinach and Ricotta
steps: Sauté onion and garlic in olive oil until soft.
Mix spinach with ricotta, season with salt and pepper.
Stuff cannelloni with spinach mixture.
Place in baking dish, cover with tomato sauce and mozzarella.
Bake at 180°C for 25 minutes.
Serve hot.
